headline: Facing Questions on Future, Cisco Posts a Revenue Drop
snippet: The company is struggling with sluggish emerging markets like China....

headline: China Pulls Cisco Into Dispute on Cyberspying
snippet: A state-run newspaper says the network equipment maker has close ties with the U.S. government and military, which the company denies....

headline: Energy and Tech Stocks Push the Market Higher
snippet: The market was led by big technology companies like Cisco Systems, which was the biggest gainer in the sector, and energy stocks as oil rebounded....

headline: 2 Cisco Presidents Will Leave in a Restructuring
snippet: Two Cisco Systems presidents are leaving the company as Chuck Robbins takes over as chief executive and moves to a “flatter” leadership team....

headline: Strong Equipment Demand Lifts Sales and Profit for Cisco
snippet: Cisco Systems reported higher-than-expected quarterly revenue and profit, highlighting a strong recovery in demand for its switching equipment and routers....

headline: Valuation Quirks Help End Proposed Polycom-Mitel Merger
snippet: Investors were unimpressed after both companies lost money while under threat from larger rivals like Cisco....

headline: Cisco to Cut 5,500 Jobs in Shift Toward Software
snippet: The maker of networking gear said it would shift focus away from hardware and gradually move to higher-margin software....

headline: Intel Seems to Have a Stronger Hand Than Cisco Systems
snippet: The outlook for last-generation tech companies is often grim as their products become commonplace, rivals find alternatives and margins shrink....

headline: Cisco Pays Fantastical Price for Software Firm
snippet: A $3.7 billion deal for AppDynamics offers some respite from hardware woes. But Cisco is paying a price on which it will take years to earn a decent return....

headline: Shares Tumble on Shaky Earnings From Tech and Retail Companies
snippet: Wall Street took broad losses, led by weak quarterly reports from Cisco Systems and Walmart Stores.
